Name: ШХД: ЛЕТО / IT'S SUMMER
About the game: You just woke up after a midday nap in your country house surrounded by the swishing sound of turntable. You are 8 years old. It's Summer is an indie video game which genres are “sandbox”, “babushka”, and “midday nap”. The game has neither goal nor sense. There are only you, cheap tea bags with russian tears and the endless yellow field. The game itself is integral part of the Digital-opera 'ШХД: ЛЕТО'. This project also contains a book, LP record, series of digital-art collaborations and something more. ШХД: ЛЕТО is the second and final part of the project ШХД: ЗИМА (It's Winter).
